actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolves, that the Senate disapproves the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay, for the offices referred to in section 225(f) (a) of the Federal Salary Act of 1967.

summary.text: Declares that the Senate disapproves the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay, referred to in the Federal Salary Act of 1967 (relating to Members of Congress), transmitted to the Congress on February 4, 1974, pursuant to such Act.

titles.title: Resolves, that the Senate disapproves the recommendations of the President with respect to rates of pay, for the offices referred to in section 225(f) (a) of the Federal Salary Act of 1967.
